review: Yes it did.  I am really enjoying it.
author: just me "Just me"

review: If you have a Netflix membership definitely download the app because there are a lot of TV shows you pay for even on Prime that are included with your streaming Netflix membership. We watched the Hunger Games (the three movies currrently out) and the first we had to buy (couldn't rent it), the second was available via Prime for free, and the third we had to rent. That was also disappointing. The device and how it works is still excellent, though, and that's why I gave it a full 5 stars.
author: Sean Siemen

review: it was very disappointing.Spent almost 2 1/2 hours on phone with support team at tier 1,2 and 3 to no avail
author: Carmen V.

review: Love this thing. Haven't used my Apple TV since I got it. I've been an Apple fan for years, but find myself slowly converting over to Amazon because their devices integrate better, and for less money, with a larger selection of content.
author: Vermonter

review: I think it's great for the price verry cool use it every day like it more then using the PS3 for media
author: chaz perriera

review: AWESOME!!! Exzatly what I was looking for!!
author: KimD

review: It's been very convenient and we have enjoyed a good variety of content so far.
author: Chris Fazzari

review: I Actually got two of these products when they first came out. Gave one away to my brother, who loves it, and kept one for myself. I use this when I travel. Plugs right into the TV's HDMI port and connects quickly to a WIFI signal. It allows me to stream pretty much anything I want to watch, so I don't have to brother with the lame 15 channels that the hotels offer.
author: ACUSERCOR

review: Works very much like its larger sibling, and since the recent software update it is really useful for hotels and other places that require you to log in via a web page.  I haven't been to a hotel that requires this level of authentication since using the stick, but it was a big feature touted for the new software.  I use it to play Prime video and Plex content, as such it works extremely well.
author: Mr. P. T. Drew
